name: Classic Burger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, and cheese, served with crispy fries.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A traditional Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and parmesan cheese, tossed in Caesar dressing.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet served with a side of steamed vegetables.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Spaghetti tossed in a creamy sauce with pancetta, egg, and parmesan.

name: Tiramisu
description: A classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
